The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 November is 1,104,143 (1,961.6 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 07 November, there were 142,143 new confirmed cases (252.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 October, there were 130,528 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 9% ( 11,615 extra cases).
